name: Special Abilities
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Serpentfolk/Example Serpentfolk/Serpentfolk Bone Prophet/Serpentfolk Bone Prophet/Special Abilities

sections.body: Bite—injury; save Fort DC 17; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1d2 Str; cure 2 saves. The save DC is Constitution-based.
sections.name: Poison
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Serpentfolk/Example Serpentfolk/Serpentfolk Bone Prophet/Serpentfolk Bone Prophet/Special Abilities/Poison
